full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MTHU STOBS KYI DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE NAG PO CHEN PO GDONG BZHI PA'I TSOGS MCHOD DPAL MGON DGYES PA'I 'DZUM ZHAL CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BYA BA 'DI BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I YONGS KYI GTZUG RGYAN KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS CHAB SHOG GI LAM NAS BSKUL BA GNANG BA'I BZHED PA BSKANG PHYIR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS BSTI GNAS SU DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB KYI GLING DU ME STAG BKRA SHIS ZLA DRUG PA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI MKHA' 'GRO 'DU BA'I TSES BZANG POR SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
